longBusinessSummary: Kaushalya Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited primarily engages in executing construction contracts relating to infrastructure and real estate developments in India. The company operates through Construction and Hotel segments. It also develops highways, bridges, and industrial infrastructure; electrification, mining, and irrigation projects; and residential and commercial complexes. In addition, the company engages in the operation of hotels; acquisition, development, and sale of land business. Further, it is involved in trading of school shoes and bags. Kaushalya Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.
